channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: HI I NEED HELP IN PUTTING MORE NPC'S IN MY SERVER HOW DO I DO IT? ALSO HOW DO I MAKE PPL ADMINS AND HOW DO I PUT IT ONLINE? THANKYOU FOR YOUR HELP.

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

to put it online get hamachi or register at no-ip

for admining people go to go to characters click the name u want and make player rights - 3 ,2 ,1 ,or 0

3 = owner
2 = administrator
1 = moderator
0 = normal character

and for spawning npcs i think u gotta use autospawn.

p.s im a noob to just ask around and eventualy everything will come together.

Read full topic
